title: Question about Illaoi
body:
How do I go about ganking her? It seems every single gank goes the same way

1.) Walk up
2.) Do some little CC and Damage
3.) She walks into top brush
4.) We ward trink it
5.) Holy shit what the fuck tentacles everywhere why is this happening.

It doesnt matter how far ahead I am she always does WTF damage to both of us while building straight tank.

Help me GD
